name: ColorForce
description:
This is an action/puzzle game.

Objective: by shooting the portals the bullet will teleport and will change its color, match the color of the bullet with the color of the sphere to destroy them and survive.

You will lose if: The spheres reaches your portal (twice for each portal), third time the sphere will enter your domain and will result in losing the game.

Controls:

  • keyboard (arrows + space)
  • gamepad (left analog + right trigger)
